doc.title: First Copies of The End of Char Kway Teow available this Saturday!
doc.text: Thanks/DT so/RB much/JJ for/IN all/DT your/JJ support/NN for/IN my/PRP$ upcoming/NN book/NN !/. The/DT book/NN will/MD be/VB officially/JJ launched/NN this/DT Saturday/NN ,/, 18/NN Dec/NN and/CC I/PRP will/VB be/VB at/IN Littered/NN with/IN Books/NN at/IN 20/CD Duxton/NNP Road/NNP to/TO talk/VB about/IN the/DT book/NN ./. Even/RB if/IN you/PRP ca/MD n't/RB attend/VB the/DT talk/VB ,/, you/PRP can/MD still/RB drop/VB in/IN between/IN 7pm/NN and/CC 9pm/NN to/TO pick/VB up/IN autographed/JJ copies/NN of/IN the/DT book/NN ./. But/CC better/NN still/RB if/IN you/PRP can/MD get/VB the/DT tickets/NN to/TO join/VB us/PRP for/IN wine/NN and/CC Bak/NNP Kwa/NN !/. You/PRP can/MD register/VB by/IN clicking/VBG this/DT link/NN ./. See/VB you/PRP this/DT Saturday/NN !/. View/NNP Larger/NNP Map/NNP
